name: app_icon
objective: An application icon must occupy one tile
description: The tile should display the application icon ant its name
pre_condition: some favourite applications must be present on the desktop

steps.expected: the icon and name must be displayed

author: sdx

name: app_icon_actions
objective: Right click on app icon should pop a menu
description:
A right click on any application icon should open a popup menu, extending on 2 tiles near the application icon (on left or right, depending on the tile position) (TODO: please confirm)
The popup menu contains the following items:
- Open Application
- Remove from home
- Show settings (opens home settings)
pre_condition: some favourite applications must be present on the desktop

steps.description: right-click on a favourite application tile
steps.expected: a popup menu should open with all the items listed in description

steps.description: right-click on a favourite aplication tile

steps.expected: the homescreen settings panel must appear on screen (close it)

steps.description: right-click on a favourite application tile

steps.expected: the favourite application tile must disappear from the desktop

author: sdx

name: app_icon_size
description:
An application icon must fit into a tile, without overlap on the application name.

An application icon should have a dimension of WxH (TODO: what is W and H ? 48x48 ?)
pre_condition: some favourite applications must be present on the desktop

steps.description: observe tha favorite applications tiles on desktop
steps.expected: they must all match the description

notes: suggestion: make a screen capture (PrtScr key), copy and load the snapshot into gimp or another image viewer and then check dimensions.
